sentences.en: He persistently asserted his right to a share in the heritage.
sentences.cn: 他坚持声称他分享遗产的权利。

sentences.en: They have persistently denied claims of illegal dealing.
sentences.cn: 他们一再否认进行非法交易的说法。

sentences.en: Rachel gently but persistently imposed her will on Doug.
sentences.cn: 雷切尔温和而坚定地将她的意志强加在道格身上。
